B

Bills - Record Class in model
Bills is a mask of the database table bill
Bills(int, int, int, int, Double) - Constructor for record class model.Bills
Creates an instance of a Bills record class.
BillsBLL - Class in bll
BillsBLL Class represents the bill logic, using BillsDAO
BillsBLL() - Constructor for class bll.BillsBLL
 
BillsDAO - Class in dao
BillsDAO implements the logic of database table bill through ConnectionFactory
BillsDAO() - Constructor for class dao.BillsDAO
 
BillsInterface - Class in presentation
User Interface to manage Bills, which is controlled by presentation.Control
BillsInterface() - Constructor for class presentation.BillsInterface
 
bll - package bll
 
bll.validators - package bll.validators
